window.__hz__: This is the ideal refresh rate.

backEnd.__iterationRate__: This is the number of iterations that will be attempted to be completed per second for logic base

virus.__proximity__: This is denoted as the distance in pixels. where you can be infected
virus.__infectivity__: This is denoted as a percent from 0-100, does not need to be a natural.
virus.__longevity__: Longevity of the virus, in some measurement I haven't chosen yet, maybe days, which could mean days * 24 pixel movements per day.
